'''Janet Brennan Croft''' (born [[1961]]) is an American author, editor, and Associate University Librarian for Content Discovery, University of Northern Iowa. She is the editor of ''[[Mythlore|Mythlore: A Journal of J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Charles Williams, and Mythopoeic Literature]]''.<ref>"Notes on Contributors" in [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 4|''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 4]] (p. 366)</ref>
